title: Bug 116744Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: The dynamic text content type does not have any effect when used to display the contents of a database field that contains three types of content: 1) HTML text within <html>...</html> tags, 2) HTML fragments not within <html> tags, and 3) Text with RTF tags.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1) Create a database field with the mentioned types of content. 2) Use a dynamic text element to display the field's contents.
